**Electric Toothbrush with Pressure Sensors**: Create an electric toothbrush that has pressure sensors to alert the user if they are applying too much pressure while brushing. This would help prevent enamel damage and gum issues.

**Toothbrush with Built-in Timer**: Design a toothbrush that has a built-in timer to ensure the user brushes for the recommended two minutes. This could also include a countdown timer that starts when the user presses the brush against their teeth.

**Toothbrush with UV Sterilization**: Develop a toothbrush that comes with a built-in UV sterilizer, which would kill bacteria and germs after each use, ensuring a cleaner and more hygienic brushing experience.

**Toothbrush with Adjustable Brush Head**: Create a toothbrush with interchangeable brush heads that can be adjusted for different types of teeth, such as sensitive teeth, whitening teeth, or gum care.

**Toothbrush with Replaceable Batteries**: Design a toothbrush with replaceable batteries that can be easily replaced when they run out of power. This would make the toothbrush more environmentally friendly and cost-effective.
